overview: A slew of inspirational artists make appearances at this gathering of the National Quartet Convention, which is a magnet for some of the biggest and brightest stars in the world of Southern gospel music. Selections include "Blow Your Trumpet, Gabriel" by the Booth Brothers; "Stand by Me" by Signature Sound; "That Little Baby" by Gold City; "Yes, I Am" by the Hoppers; and "I'm Standing on the Solid Rock" by the Florida Boys.
title: NQC Live 2003
